args.title: Command line arguments
args.description:
Shell command executed by orchestrator from
orchestrator's current working directory

stdin.title: Standard input
stdin.description:
Initial string data available to component on
standard input

capture_output.title: Capture output
capture_output.description:
If this property is set to true, orchestrator will read
and log component's stdout/stderr.

delay.title: Delay
delay.description:
Startup delay applied only for first component's
startup. If value is 0, timeout is ignored.

revive.title: Revive
revive.description:
If this property is set to true, orchestrator will start
component's process if process is stopped.

auto_start.title: Auto start
auto_start.description:
If this property is set to true, orchestrator will start
component's process on orchestrator startup.

start_delay.title: Start delay
start_delay.description: Delay in seconds applied before each component's startup.

create_timeout.title: Create timeout
create_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for creating process.

sigint_timeout.title: SIGINT timeout
sigint_timeout.description:
Timeout in seconds for waiting return code after sending
SIGINT.

sigkill_timeout.title: SIGKILL timeout
sigkill_timeout.description:
Timeout in seconds for waiting return code after sending
SIGKILL.
